title: NA Speaker condoles over death of Ejaz Jakhrani’s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 21 (APP): Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed deep sorrow and grief over the sad demise of the mother of Pakistan People’s Party Chief Whip and Member National Assembly Ejaz Hussain Jakhrani.
In his condolence message on Saturday, the Speaker said that the loss of mother was an irreparable tragedy and an immense sorrow that was difficult to overcome.
The Speaker extended his heartfelt condolences and sympathy to MNA Ejaz Hussain Jakhrani and his family, saying that he shares their grief in this moment of profound loss.
He prayed to Almighty Allah to elevate the departed soul to the highest ranks in His mercy and to grant patience and strength to the bereaved family to bear this immense loss.
